Text: Request Submitted Access Request YGCYNKDLForwarded by Yvette G ConneveyCorpEnron on AM Information Risk Management AM Sent by Yvette G Connevey To Yvette G nron cc Subject Request Submitted Access Request YGCYNKDL Thank you for your request You will be notified via eMail when your request has been processed You can check the progress of your request by doing one of the following In the SRRS application click on Requests I Have Made A listing of recent requests will be appear sorted by resource name Click on the Request Link below This is a link to information regarding your request Below is a summary of your request Requested For Liz Bellamy Request Date AM Request Type New HireEmployee Request Link Requested Resources CPR Houston Default Applications Lotus Notes New ID Access Only a SITARA Production US Unify Market Ops Unify Pipeline Operations If you have any questions please contact Information Risk Management at

Organization Staff Meeting Cc to yesterdays staff meeting please plan to attend a meeting next Wednesday August th from pm in Conference Room c As Brenda lined out yesterday the goal of the meeting is to reassess the organizational structure Be prepared to offer positive helpful suggestions comments and ideas If you have any questions please call Thank You Yvette x

Pan Energy Duke Field Services Cc to meet this Thursday August rd from in Conference Room C regarding Pan Energy Duke Field Services If you have any questions or conflicts please call Thank you Yvette x

Verifying Transaction Count Cc to attend a meeting tomorrow afternoon from pm in Conference Room C regarding Verifying Transaction COunt Brenda has left each of you a voicemail detailing the goal of this meeting Thank You Yvette x

Customer Trip Cc July customer trip is right around the corner Im sure you will be hearing more questions from your customers as the day arrives Just in case here are a few helpful hints I am currently today in the process of putting together a To Bring list for you customers Just a helpful list of clothing items sun skin care suggestions etc list that they may want to pack An agenda will be coming shortly after that As you all know each of your customers are responsible for getting themselves to Florida If for some reason you have a high maintenance customer who is really pushing the issue of us helping them find a flight we will help target some flights they can take They will still be responsible for the fare Please dont freely offer this suggestion only use it as an emergency I do have the list of each of your customers who have RSVPd if you have any customers who you are afraid may back out please let me know who they are so that I can make a Glad youre coming do you have any questions phone call a few days before departure to ensure they are still coming If you have any other questions or concerns let me know Yvette x

SAP TimeKeeping Cc have received your Logon ID and password for SAP this morning We will hold a learning lunch early next week walking you through the new HR Online system and Timekeeping system You will not know how to key your time until then I will keep you posted on the details of the learning lunch Y

Organizational Changes within Risk ManagementForwarded by Yvette G ConneveyCorpEnron on AM Chantelle CT PM To Kathryn CT Jennifer deBoisblanc CT William CT David CT Cathy De La CT Brenda H CT Mary Theresa CT Elizabeth L CT Crystal CT Alicia CT Kimat CT Jeanne NRON Melba A CT Jeff NRON Sandy CT Jeffrey C CT Hillary nron Gregory A CT Kimberly S CT Michelle NRON Chris CT Rahmaan NRON Gabriel CT Robin CT Dawn C CT Heather ChoateHOUECT Irena D CT Yvette G NRON Bryce CT Katherine L CT Susan CT Steve CT Scott CT Brent A CT Kimberly CT cc Subject Organizational Changes within Risk Management Assistants please forward on to your groups Effective in August David Oliver will be leaving the East Desk Risk Management team to take on a Risk Lead role in the Enron London office Kyle Etter will be joining the East team as the new Lead and will begin transitioning into his new role over the next few weeks Please join the East Desk in congratulating both David and Kyle and wishing them well on their new opportunities

SAP Changes Cc SAP now here there are going to be a few minor changes that we will all have to make immediately First Everyone will have to make Internet Explorer their Default Browser If youre not sure how to do this give me a call and I will help The reason for this is that our new TimeSheet Program will only run through Internet Explorer Second Sometime next week we will have a brown bag lunch where I will walk you through entering your time in this New System Its not time consuming just different Third Next Thursday you will be emailed an SAP logon ID and Password Please dont delete or disregard the importance of this email You will need it to key your time Fourth All company and RC s are changing The company part is easy It will be digits so if your company number is currently it will now be or if it is it will now be Easy RC s are now called Cost Centers and they are changing completely Please write these down somewhere you will need them just like you need to know your RC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC The transition shouldnt be too painful for you but it promises to be a little stressful for your assistants so please bear with us and cooperate Thank You Yvette x
UA Lunch Meetings Cc Wednesday June th please plan to attend a weekly UA lunch meeting every Wednesday from pm in Conference Room If you have any questions or concerns please call Thank you Yvette x
June Vacationsubmit your June Vacation to me ASAP Thank You Yvette x

Astros Ticketshas a few ticket s that she would like to make available to you either for yourselves or for your teams First come first serve BUT we would like to distribute these evenly so dont be stingy They are tickets for TONIGHT pm vs Philadelphia Phillies tickets for Friday May th pm vs Atlanta Braves tickets for Friday May th pm vs Atlanta Braves tickets for Saturday June rd pm vs White Sox tickets for Tuesday June th pm vs Minnesota Twins tickets for Thursday July th pm vs Arizona Diamond Backs tickets for Friday July st pm vs St Louis Cardinals tickets for Tuesday August th pm vs Pittsburgh Pirates Thanx Y
Meter Volume Overridesplan to attend a meeting this Thursday from pm in Conference Room to address Meter Volume Overrides for Period thru If you have any questions please call Thank you Yvette x

The Announcement you have been waiting all year for Cc this on to all your people ENA Gas Assets Group Outing You have between now and June th to practice and get ready Its time to get in touch with you inner bowler Thats right we are going bowling Tuesday June th all of Gas Assets everyone under Brendas direction will be going Bowling We will depart the Enron building between and on buses no not the yellow kind and we head for Dynamic Lanes where everyone will be placed on a team of bowl three games compete and cheat just joking for fabulous prizes and then return to the Enron building around pm just in time to catch buses and go home FAQ Is it mandatory that I go No BUT you will be gravely missed if you are not there you will be left out of all the inside jokes that are sure to come as a result of this event and you run the risk of being ridiculed by your coworkers for not attending If I dont go bowling can I leave work stop working at No If I do go does that mean I do not have to return to work to complete required daily tasks such as PL No

Performance Review MidYearthose of you who have been trying to access the PEP System this morning or today stop trying There are still problems with the system and it is unlikely that you will be bale to get in or submit your reviewers successfully INSTEAD please submit your list of reviewers to Brenda via email She will make any changes necessary and forward them on to the PEP Helpdesk They will then be responsible for entering your reviewers manually If you have any questions please call Thanx Yvette x Forwarded by Yvette G ConneveyCorpEnron on PM From Brenda F Herod ECT PM To Eric CT Michael CT David CT Bryan CT ONeal D CT Yvette G NRON Lisa CT Daren J CT Mary M CT Rita CT Steve CT Pat NRON Michael CT cc Subject Performance Review MidYear Its that time of the year again just earlier this year than last year Please log into the PEP system when it becomes available and select at least five feedback reviewers The feedback is intended to reflect interraction throughout the organization For leads and managers and directors please make sure you include at least one direct report The reviewers you select should be employees whom you have worked with frequently since and whom can provide constructive feedback as to your performance Nothing prevents you from selecting more than reviewers I will review them and if I feel there are others whom should be added I will do so ASSUMING the system becomes available soon please complete your selection process by COB Tuesday I want to approve these ASAP so we can get our request out early Turn around is critical The next thing I will need is a listing of your accomplishments for I would like these by EMail by Monday June am Once again the timeline is critical to the process and is not negotiable Although we have reorganized the Risk group effective I will still perform the performance reviews Mike Steve will be responsible for your review Let me know if you hav any questions or concerns Thanks for supporting the process and the timeline

Texas Risk Organization Cc o ON BEHALF OF STEVE VENTURATOS You recently received a memo from Brenda Herod laying out the Organizational changes that would effect the Texas Region this follow up is an effort to breakdown our Risk organization With new members being added to the team many responsibilities will be changing however controls and other measures already in place will ensure a smooth transition Following is the schedule of responsibilities effective May st and June st as the transition will take a month Effective May Effective June FT Texas ONeal Winfree Ami Chokshi Gas Daily ONeal Winfree Ami CHockshi IntraMonth Bryan Hull ONeal Winfree Mick Walters Transport Mick Walters Mick Walters Storage Dave Baumbach Jody Crook FT South Texas Jody Crook Jody Crook FT EOL Texas Jody Crook Jody Crook FT New Texas ONeal Winfree Ami Chokshi FT IM Denver Mick Walters Bryan Hull Mick Walters FT HPLC ONeal Winfree ONeal Winfree Mick Walters Deal Validation Julie Meyers Julie Meyers OA Phillip Love TBD

Yvette OOTO Cc o be on vacation Monday April th thru Friday April st Elizabeth Soto will be backing me up on Monday and Ragayle Pellum will back me up the remainder of the week If you have any questions regarding Brendas calendar need to make changes or need to set up a meeting with her please contact Chantelle Villanueva at ext If you need assistance with anyone elses calendar who I support please contact Ragayle

Re March preliminary ledgers Cc one guys the last one was distorted Apologies Y Forwarded by Yvette G ConneveyCorpEnron on PM Holly Heath PM To Yvette G NRON cc Brenda F CT Subject Re March preliminary ledgers Sorry Yvette try this one Enron North America Corp From Yvette G Connevey PM To Holly nron cc Subject Re March preliminary ledgers Holly This spreadsheet seems to have errors in every cell Can you help Yvette x Holly Heath PM To Brenda F CT cc Yvette G NRON Subject March preliminary ledgers Attached are your preliminary March ledgers Please review and have any changes to me by noon Friday April th If you have any questions please call me at Thanks so much Holly Heath

February OM Reports Cc February budget numbers attached Y Forwarded by Yvette G ConneveyCorpEnron on AM Enron North America Corp From Jennifer Blay ECT PM To Brenda F CT cc Yvette G NRON Subject February OM Reports Attached are your Final February OM Reports Please call me with any questions Thank You Jennifer

Re Helpget with Brenda on February and Brian will be getting me March Ken Seaman should have be correct because I personally made him inactive on Feb th the final day of his last pay period we couldnt do it his real last day because we had to allow that pay period to finish out so it would kick out a timesheet for him The Specialist may actually be Ami because her title was incorrect for awhile but well look at it to make sure Ill keep you posted Y Forwarded by Yvette G ConneveyCorpEnron on PM Brian CT PM To Yvette G NRON cc Subject Re Help Yvette Starting with March all Labor Distribution reports will come through me and I will distribute them Brenda should have received all of the Labor Reports for the RCs that report to her for February I say should have because they were supposed to be sent out by someone else I will try get you a copy of the February reports and send them to you Hopefully in the future with me controlling the distribution we will not have this problem Thanks Brian To Brian ct cc Daren J CT Subject Help Brian Who do I talk to about getting Daren Farmer a Labor Distribution report He needs to see what employees are hitting his RC I know that we have discussed this prior and soem Managers are receiving a monthly report but he is not Who can help us Thank you Yvette x

Help Cc Who do I talk to about getting Daren Farmer a Labor Distribution report He needs to see what employees are hitting his RC I know that we have discussed this prior and soem Managers are receiving a monthly report but he is not Who can help us Thank you Yvette x

EOPS salary survey questionnaire Cc out and have submitted back to Kim by Friday at pm If you have any conflicts or questions please call Thank you Yvette x Forwarded by Yvette G ConneveyCorpEnron on PM Kim CT PM To Brenda F CT Yvette G NRON cc Subject EOPS salary survey questionnaire As per your request Forwarded by Kim MelodickHOUECT on PM Kim Melodick PM To Bob CT Robert CT Leslie CT Sheila CT Kristin CT Brenda F CT D Todd CT Brent A CT Michael E CT Stephen P CT Mary CT Scott CT cc Sally CT Norma CT Yvonne CT Subject EOPS salary survey questionnaire Attached you will find the salary survey questionnaire for your review You will need to fill out the questionnaire for each exempt job group in your department Please be as specific as possible to ensure we are capturing all the skills needed to accurately price the job If you have filled out the questionnaire in the past you may want to update the information I will be happy to address any questions you have regarding the form

This Thursdays OffsiteThursdays OffSite has been cancelled in light of the ENA meeting with Whalley and Baxter being moved to Thursday Please place the same priority on the ENA meeting that you would have placed on the Management OffSite Again all are encouraged to attend with the same exceptions of business coverage and the same expectations of professional presentation Below is the message that Brian Redmond sent out Team Cliff Baxter Greg Whalley and Dave Delainey would like to combine the Asset Group floor meeting with the general ENA Employee Meeting that will be held on Thursday March th from pm to pm in the Hyatt Regency Hotel Therefore our meeting today with Cliff Greg and Dave at pm has been canceled You are encouraged to submit questions in advance by email or interoffice mail to or EB For those of you participating in the PD Session on Thursday I would like to start the session earlier beginning at pm and then we will break at pm to attend the Employee Meeting We will regroup after the Employee Meeting to summarize the results of the session Please let Kathy Benedict know if there is a conflict with this change I look forward to seeing you there Regards Brian If you have any questions please call Thank You Yvette x

Management OffSite Follow up Cc This Thursday March th is the Management Team OffSite Follow Up Meeting we will be returning to the Plaza Club We will have lunch at and resume the meeting to cover the Training issues that were not discussed prior If there are any other issues that you would like to see revisited or covered please let me know by Wednesday Remember we will be walking so Yvette x

Cc Tuesday March th there will be an ENA Gas Assets Meeting with Cliff Baxter and Greg Whalley from pm in Conference Room EBC Everyone who supports the ENA Gas Assets business is encouraged to attend this includes each Manager and your groups Understanably you may need some people covering desks and phones who wont get to attend For those who will be able to make it keep in mind we would like to leave everyone with a professional image of our groups Please encourage your groups to be there on time if not slightly early and modeling the Enron dress code If you have any questions please call Thank You Yvette x

Follow up day OffSite Cc Thursday March th pm as Tentative for the Follow Up Meeting to our OffSite As soon as I have more concrete information I will let you know NOTE If I manage your calendar it has been updated Thank you Yvette x

March th Staff MeetingStaff Meeting on March th will be moved back an hour to This change is in effort to free up your time to attend the ENA Gas Assets Group Meeting being held from in C with Cliff Baxter and Greg Whalley Thank You Yvette x

Mtg with Gas Assets GroupSubject Mtg with Gas Assets Group The date and time of the BaxterWhalley meeting has been changed please mark your calendar as follows Please mark your calendar for the upcoming ENA Gas Assets Meeting with Cliff Baxter and Greg Whalley Date Tuesday March Place EB c Time pm

Monthly Manangement Lunchclear your calendars for lunch on Wednesday March th from This will be a lunch for the Management team ONLY meaning no Brenda I will take suggestions until Monday and then I will be making reservations If you have any questions please call Thank you Yvette x

TimeLine Calendars Cc Management Offsite Meeting please provide me with your monthly calendars showing your vital business days close bidweek etc If necessary to capture all those days please provide me with the months of January and February Please work with your assistants to get this accomplished before next Monday For those of you without please give me a call and we can set a time to sit down and I will handle your calendars Thank You Yvette x

HR Business Plan for Gas Assets Group Cc to attend a meeting next Tuesday February th from pm in Conference Room C The obejective is to assist HR in their production of a Business Plan geared towards the Gas Assets Group This meeting is a direct result of the Management Offsite If you have any questions or conflicts please call Thank you Yvette x
Follow Up Meeting Cc me with as many dates as possible during the weeks of and where you would be available for another half day Thanx Yvette

Re Management OffSitetime I have to tell someone there is a charge just joking At The Plaza Club Louisiana We are all gonna walk over tomorrow if you want to meet in the lobby about Daren J CT PM To Yvette G NRON cc Subject Re Management OffSite Yvette Where is this offsite taking place I know you told in the meeting the other day but I didnt write it down D

Management OffSiteTomorrow is Brendas Management Team Offsite Meeting Thank you for all your confirmations We would like to take a different approach to this meeting soooooo instead of an agenda I am asking that each of you submit a topic that you would like have discussed in a RoundTable format at tomorrows meeting Topics can range from issues the Management Team does well that we can apply to other areas issues where we can improve and do better than we are places where we should challenge the status quo I realize that this request is a little gray and a little broad so if you have any questions please call otherwise please have your topics submitted by the end of today dont you just love short notice requests All of your input is what will make this meeting successful so thank you in advance Yvette x

Re HPL System Brown Bag Cc o will take place in C from Please confirm your attendance Thank You Yvette x Daren J CT PM To Ami NRON Stacey CT Pat NRON Robert E CT Carlos J CT Kimberly CT Charlotte CT Stella L CT Susan D CT Jackie CT Aimee CT George CT Mandy CT Eric CT Bryan CT ONeal D CT Michael CT David CT Steve CT Tom NRON Gary A CT cc Brenda F CT Yvette G NRON Subject HPL System Brown Bag Please plan on attending a training session over lunch on Tuesday Feb th Lunch will be provided I intend to discuss the operations of Houston Pipe Line how gas is moved through the system where our main supply and market areas are locations of specific points etc We will be using a map of the pipeline as the basis for the discussion So come to the meeting with any questions you have on HPL anything is fair game Yvette is currently working on securing a room I will let you know when that is finalized Let me know if you have any questions D

Brenda Herods OffSite Management Meeting Cc to attend an OffSite meeting next Wednesday February th at the Plaza Club located at Louisiana The meeting will take place in the Solarium Room The tentative agenda is Lunch Meeting Cocktails As mentioned in todays staff meeting if you have issues or items that you would like added to the agenda please forward those on As well please submit your ideas for the Management Team Building event by Friday afternoon For those of you who are afraid of what Brenda and I may come up with on our own you better submit some ideas Thank You Yvette x

Standing Budget Meeting Cc to attend a monthly Budget Meeting with Brenda The meeting will occur the th working day of each month from pm in Conference Room If you have any questions or concerns please call Thank you
HPLC ENA employees meeting Cc to attend a meeting with Brenda Wednesday afternoon from pm regarding employees and their company listing Please call if you have any questions Thanx Yvette x

Brenda Herods Management Off site Cc your calendars as soon as possible and let me know if Wednesday February th will work for our Off Site Meeting We will have lunch at and begin the meeting at approximately We are planning to have cocktails around pm Tentative reservations have already been made for this day so PLEASE RSVP back this morning Thank you Yvette x

Review Texas Budget Meeting Cc Please send me your questions regarding the Budget to be addressed in tomorrows meeting with Lisa Cousino Thanx Yvette x Forwarded by Yvette G ConneveyCorpEnron on PM Enron North America Corp From Yvette G Connevey PM To Steve CT Mary M CT Rita CT Lisa CT Daren J CT Pat NRON Lisa B CT cc Brenda F CT Subject Review Texas Budget Meeting Please plan to attend a meeting Tuesday the th from pm reviewing the Texas Budgets You will receive hard copies of the budgets tomorrow Please review them and hold ALL questions and concerns until the meeting If at all possible please forward your questions to me so that I may compile a list to be delivered to Lisa Cousino Tuesday morning Thank you Yvette x

SAP Changes Cc SAP now here there are going to be a few minor changes that we will all have to make immediately First Everyone will have to make Internet Explorer their Default Browser If youre not sure how to do this give me a call and I will help The reason for this is that our new TimeSheet Program will only run through Internet Explorer Second Sometime next week we will have a brown bag lunch where I will walk you through entering your time in this New System Its not time consuming just different Third Next Thursday you will be emailed an SAP logon ID and Password Please dont delete or disregard the importance of this email You will need it to key your time Fourth All company and RC s are changing The company part is easy It will be digits so if your company number is currently it will now be or if it is it will now be Easy RC s are now called Cost Centers and they are changing completely Please write these down somewhere you will need them just like you need to know your RC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC RC CC The transition shouldnt be too painful for you but it promises to be a little stressful for your assistants so please bear with us and cooperate Thank You Yvette x

Organizational Changes within Risk ManagementForwarded by Yvette G ConneveyCorpEnron on AM Chantelle CT PM To Kathryn CT Jennifer deBoisblanc CT William CT David CT Cathy De La CT Brenda H CT Mary Theresa CT Elizabeth L CT Crystal CT Alicia CT Kimat CT Jeanne NRON Melba A CT Jeff NRON Sandy CT Jeffrey C CT Hillary nron Gregory A CT Kimberly S CT Michelle NRON Chris CT Rahmaan NRON Gabriel CT Robin CT Dawn C CT Heather ChoateHOUECT Irena D CT Yvette G NRON Bryce CT Katherine L CT Susan CT Steve CT Scott CT Brent A CT Kimberly CT cc Subject Organizational Changes within Risk Management Assistants please forward on to your groups Effective in August David Oliver will be leaving the East Desk Risk Management team to take on a Risk Lead role in the Enron London office Kyle Etter will be joining the East team as the new Lead and will begin transitioning into his new role over the next few weeks Please join the East Desk in congratulating both David and Kyle and wishing them well on their new opportunities

Performance Review MidYearthose of you who have been trying to access the PEP System this morning or today stop trying There are still problems with the system and it is unlikely that you will be bale to get in or submit your reviewers successfully INSTEAD please submit your list of reviewers to Brenda via email She will make any changes necessary and forward them on to the PEP Helpdesk They will then be responsible for entering your reviewers manually If you have any questions please call Thanx Yvette x Forwarded by Yvette G ConneveyCorpEnron on PM From Brenda F Herod ECT PM To Eric CT Michael CT David CT Bryan CT ONeal D CT Yvette G NRON Lisa CT Daren J CT Mary M CT Rita CT Steve CT Pat NRON Michael CT cc Subject Performance Review MidYear Its that time of the year again just earlier this year than last year Please log into the PEP system when it becomes available and select at least five feedback reviewers The feedback is intended to reflect interraction throughout the organization For leads and managers and directors please make sure you include at least one direct report The reviewers you select should be employees whom you have worked with frequently since and whom can provide constructive feedback as to your performance Nothing prevents you from selecting more than reviewers I will review them and if I feel there are others whom should be added I will do so ASSUMING the system becomes available soon please complete your selection process by COB Tuesday I want to approve these ASAP so we can get our request out early Turn around is critical The next thing I will need is a listing of your accomplishments for I would like these by EMail by Monday June am Once again the timeline is critical to the process and is not negotiable Although we have reorganized the Risk group effective I will still perform the performance reviews Mike Steve will be responsible for your review Let me know if you hav any questions or concerns Thanks for supporting the process and the timeline
June Vacationsubmit your June Vacation to me ASAP Thank You Yvette x
